title: Noble ROM 2.0 brings One UI 4 with Android 12 to the Samsung Galaxy S9 and Galaxy Note 9
content:
Bored of running One UI 2.5 on your Samsung Galaxy S9 or Galaxy Note 9? Yearning to see what software experience the Korean OEM has created with One UI 4 on top of Android 12? Worry not, XDA’s aftermarket modding community has you covered. Although Samsung’s 2018 flagships will not officially get the Android 12

The post Noble ROM 2.0 brings One UI 4 with Android 12 to the Samsung Galaxy S9 and Galaxy Note 9 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Noble ROM 2.0 is a port of One UI 4 based on Android 12 for the Exynos variants of the Samsung Galaxy S9 and Galaxy Note 9. Give it a go!
